Internally the offices are open plan space with some private offices. There are 16 allocated car parking spaces to the front and rear, there are 4 car parking spaces per unit. LED lighting 32 car parking spaces in total, 4 per single suite Gas fired central heating Tea point Kitchenette Suspended ceilings Perimeter trunking Double glazed Air con A new full repairing and insuring lease are available for a term to be agreed. 12 months rent free is available by way of two years' at half rent for 5-year leases.

The property is located approximately 0.75 miles along the Horsham Road from Rusper village centre. The property is equidistant from Crawley and Horsham. The self contained detached office building has been refurbished, the unit benefits from WCs and kitchenettes on both floors. Refurbished Detached office with idyllic views 12 car parking spaces Kitchenettes on both floors WC on both floors A new full repairing and insuring lease are available for a term to be agreed.

The unit is located on Smallfield Road, with access from the B2036. Smallmead House is in close proximity to a variety of amenities such as shops, restaurants and cafe's. Smallmead House is a 0.6 mile walk to Horley station, providing services to Three Bridges (Gatwick Airport in 2 minutes), Bedford (London Bridge in 45 minutes) and Horsham (25 minutes) Unit B6 comprises of an office with a private kitchenette and two car parking spaces. The unit is immediately available. Kitchenette WC facilities 2 car parking spaces A new flexible lease is immediately available.
